title: Cannot connect to chat
body: I live in NA and my chat cant connect only in EUNE and I want to play with my friends but nothing has worked any ideas?

replies.body: Hmmm...if you consistently aren't able to connect to Chat, then it sounds like there may be an issue connecting to our Chat Servers.  I know you are able to connect in EUNE, but there seems like there might be some sort of issue.  To that end, make sure to complete all of the steps in our [Connection Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664).  It has some of the most common solutions that should resolve this issue.
